channel.title: [REQ]Sever Status[/REQ]
channel.description:
Hello, I am Requesting a simple code for a server status page. It does not have to have much for i am going to expand on it. I just need the page and the files. I can make it work with my current page, etc. I also need one that does not conflict with the server. Here is a link to the site. http://projectmoney.ifixshit.net/
Thank, MrMoney

@bryanc wrote:

If you want. I can make one tomorrow. with info and stuff like Mopars…

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ]Sever Status[/REQ]
item.dc:creator: @MrMoney MrMoney
item.description:
@MrMoney wrote:

[quote=“viruz 3, post:5, topic:191978”]I will give you mine… NOTE: You will need PHP5

Give me one second to get it…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2008, 07:21:02 PM[/size][hr][code=php]

<?php $status = ""; if(@fsockopen("your server ip here", 43594, $errno, $errstr, 2)) { $status = 'Server Online!'; } else { $status = 'Server Offline!'; }?>

[/code]

All credit goes to me! Please dont leech this![/quote]
I’ll test it…

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ]Sever Status[/REQ]
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

I will give you mine… NOTE: You will need PHP5

Give me one second to get it…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2008, 07:21:02 PM[/size][hr][code=php]

<?php $status = ""; if(@fsockopen("your server ip here", 43594, $errno, $errstr, 2)) { $status = 'Server Online!'; } else { $status = 'Server Offline!'; }?>

[/code]

Then add this to wherever you want the status to display:

Server Status: <?php echo $status; ?>

All credit goes to me! Please dont leech this!

Read full topic
